url.raw: Requires a /opt/PDP/Policies/{{domain}}.xml file with the access control policies
path: {{domain}}.xml file with the access control policies

request.description:

Request using default user credentials.

Obtain API token from X-Subject-Header in response

item.name: GET - IDM - Obtain IDM token information
2-POST - Capability Manager - Obtain Capability token (using JWT)
1-POST - IDM - Get JWT. (needs the application id and secret for Authorization header)
Loop refresh POST - IDM - Obtain Auth.Token from refresh_token (needs the application id and secret for Authorization header)

request.description:
https://fiware-idm.readthedocs.io/en/latest/oauth/oauth_documentation/index.html#introduction

The client can request for a new token using the refresh token obtained the first time through another grant type except the client credentials grant type.

item.name: 1-POST - IDM - Get access_token. (needs the application id and secret for Authorization header)
Loop refresh POST - IDM - Obtain Auth.Token from refresh_token (needs the application id and secret for Authorization header)
